website_summaries.verdict: A dependable mini fridge that comes with a stainless steel frame to ensure long-lasting durability.
pros: Offers an attractive see-through left hinge glass front door that allows you to view your items at any time
Boasts a slick black exterior and blue LED interior light bulb
Equipped with 3 adjustable and removable shelves
Offers an easy-to-use temperature control that can cool down to 36°F
cons: Temperature control leaves much to be desired
Panel buttons can be difficult to use

customer_reviews.title: Cold beer all day err day
customer_reviews.text: I've had many beverage coolers over the years and holy crap this is the best once I've ever owned. Feel like they really paid attention to all the little details- the temperature doesn't fluctuate and keeps everything cool, the door closes just right, LOVE the blue light and best of all- you get an electronic control at the price of a mechanical control cooler!!!!! Most value for money. Love the 120 can capacity, it can actually fit a little more than that. Hopefully they launch larger versions in the future- would love to get some for my office too.
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a basement beverage fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this fridge for about a month now and I love everything about it. Runs quiet and looks nice (I like that the top is nice so I can put snacks on it when having a party, etc). Holds a lot of drinks and keeps them at a perfect temp. I was concerned the cord wouldn't be long enough for where the outlet was, but sure enough the cord is actually a great length and it worked out well. Easy to set up and not too heavy to move. All around great product.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Nice, cold drinks
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been an awesome little drink cooler. I have mine set at 40 and my drinks literally stay cold for hours after removing them from the cooler. It looks sleek and could be added to just about any decor. It's simple to work and the buttons just need a light touch. The door allows you to see inside and the light is an added bonus. It is pretty much silent. Definitely recommend at this point.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Will only cool on top shelf to 42 degrees
customer_reviews.text: Will only cool on top shelf to 42 degrees. Not cold enough for beer. Unit is set at 33, lowest setting, but will only cool to 42.
customer_reviews.author: rj

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things cold, but design limits options
customer_reviews.text: This frig is pretty good. However, due to its design, valuable space is lost for the temperature & light controls in the top-front. Similarly space is lost in the top-rear for the fan. Then there's the bottom shelf area, only half-deep as the rest of areas. I am using this frig because I bought it, but I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark's valuable input

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged - seller will not respond
customer_reviews.text: BUYER'S BEWARE: After unpackaging, I noticed that the back was loose on one side. It appears this is the coil housing. It was easy to see that screws were missing (picture 1). I looked around and found them lodged in the door (picture 2). I tried screwing them in but it was clear they were stripped from the cheap plastic back wall. I contacted Amazon but they said it had to be reported to the seller. That was now two days ago and I have not heard back from either. UPDATE: I did receive an email response from the seller. They requested pictures to help their engineers - no mention of refund or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Fraley

customer_reviews.title: Mini Beverage Fridge
customer_reviews.text: We could not be happier with this purchase. The quality and beauty of this appliance far surpasses our expectations. Please be careful the door will not close sometimes if you close it and walk away. It might bounce open. Check to much sure it’s closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I know sometimes its tempting to buy the cheapest unit (though they seem to have increased the price now), but trust me, that can be a terrible mistake and one I know first hand. Don't waste your money on this device, I did, but returned it. All about it feels like its going to go wrong pretty soon after warranty expires, its poorly made, noisy and just not worth the headache. There's better units like the one I bought here also for just a few more dollars - like night and day.
customer_reviews.author: ThaisMayaOfficial / Zefa Real

customer_reviews.title: so so happy with this fridge
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, so so happy with this fridge! Thank you Amazon and the reviews! We bought this as it had the best reviews by far for the price and I agree... so quiet, temperature is adjustable, shelves adjust... so happy!
customer_reviews.author: W. Gregg

customer_reviews.title: For a lil' fridge cubby in inlaws kitchen
customer_reviews.text: They love the design, with the see through glass front and led lighting. Holds any assortment of wine, "beer", and soda bottles or cans with adjustable shelving. I purchased this particular model, not just for the perfect size for their setup, but the construction, which includes a digital thermostat, plus an internal fan, which a lot of the cheaper small refrigerators didn't have.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S Towne

customer_reviews.title: ... back lighting and a digital thermometer (which is especially great for perfect wine temperature)
customer_reviews.text: Everything your would want in a beverage cooler including back lighting and a digital thermometer (which is especially great for perfect wine temperature). Great for your man cave and even worked great when our camper fridge broke down, just kept in the shade and it worked great even in 100 degree temperatures. Strongly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Blobaum

customer_reviews.title: its ok checked dosent go below 39, set at 33
customer_reviews.text: its ok, quiet, strange racks , led on all the time or leave off/////no auto feature, set at 33, only goes to 39 ...i checked w instant digital thermommeter. may improve if i had more things in fridgeu update know door dosent make seal when shut, like its not magnitized , just bounces open , temp goes up , kinda sucks for 279: dollars
customer_reviews.author: njp

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this refrigerator as a Christmas present for my husband to put in his Game Room... it is AMAZING so far (of course, it hasn't been long) but we both really like it. It was really easy to set up, didn't take long to get cold, holds a good amount of beverages and they're all cold enough for our liking. We've kept it at 34 degrees because we both like our drinks really cold. I'm very happy with this purchase and it became a wonderful gift. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie R. Marynik

customer_reviews.title: It keeps drinks very cold!
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller inside than expected. The bottom of the fridge will only hold 2 rows of cans bottles because it is raised in the back. I assume to accommodate for the compressor. This fridge doesn't accommodate bottles well. They only stand on the bottom. The other racks they have to be placed on their sides. I'm not sure that it will hold as many cans as advertised. I am a little disappointed about that. However it keeps the drinks cold and that trumps volume! I keep the temp at 33 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Newbie

customer_reviews.title: Great for anything you need to keep cold!
customer_reviews.text: This product had pretty stellar reviews on Amazon when i ordered it but a few bad ones too; i was a bit apprehensive about it, but it was the highest rated beverage center available, so I went ahead with it. I gotta be honest; this thing kicks ass! I've had no issues with it. It's had adjustable temperatures, it keeps everything the temps I want and everything fits just right because i can adjust the shelves. what more could you want? A+++
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Like the look and size, but door opens too easily and wire racks inside isn't good for drinks
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get a standalone beverage fridge and I'm so happy I have it, but there are a couple of issues with this one. The first thing I noticed was when putting my drinks in there, the wire racks make the drinks askew and not stand up straight. This causes easy tipping of drinks when people go in and grab a drink. The second thing I noticed is that the kids don't necessarily close doors nicely, so it will pop right open. I'm sure in the month that I've had it, I've wasted a ton of energy keeping it cold when the door was accidentally left open.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Chen

customer_reviews.title: Does not cool below 46 degrees
customer_reviews.text: I have the fridge set to 33 degrees and have inserted a thermometer specifically built for a refrigerators and the reading never goes below 45 degrees. The family ended up with food poisoning eating meat we should not have. I hope to exchange as I'm guessing this is a faulty unit.
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware if you need to return
customer_reviews.text: Despite our best attempts to measure, when this frig arrived it just didn't fit. We planned to return or exchange for a smaller frig. Unfortunately, this company DOES NOT pay return shipping. Return shipping was approx $120 (about 1/2 the original cost). Way too steep. Now, we are stuck with a frig that doesn't fit. In today's world of online shopping companies that don't cover return shipping are behind the times. We won't order from this company again...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice little fridge
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on stocking 120 cans then they have to be 12 oz cans or 12 oz bottles. Anything taller will have to be laid on its side and that includes water bottles and soda bottles taller than 12 oz and you won't be able to get 120 items into the fridge. I don't know for sure it holds 120 cans because I haven't bought that many. The lowest setting is 33 degrees so you be able to freeze anything. I thought it would be cool to have a fridge just for drinks and if you find the house fridge is overwhelmed with too many drink bottles this is an easy solution at a decent price
customer_reviews.author: Frank Mouton

customer_reviews.title: Beer Fridge
customer_reviews.text: It almost fits A case of beer per shelf however it does not. just a quarter-half inch shy, that was a little disappointing. My brother in law got the vremy 3.6 cu ft and while it’s deeper, it’s not Any wider. His fridge arrived poorly packaged and a bit dinged up. The hOmeLabs was perfect, double wrapped. Mint condition. They did a great job packaging it. It’s light enough to handle by yourself and has adjustable feet in the front only so it can be challenging to level off just right (perhaps a design flaw). Overall great purchase, Time to drink up!
customer_reviews.author: Sillihkram

customer_reviews.title: Guests love it
customer_reviews.text: This beverage cooler works great and is a hit with guests. Extremely quiet, easy to view beverages and just looks appealing. As a meticulous beer connoisseur who keeps a keg cooler at 38 degrees F, I had to check the accuracy of the temperature setting. Using a digital electronic probe I found the setting was off by about 5 degrees. To achieve 38 degrees internal temperature with the unit fully loaded required a setting equal to 33 degrees. Not an issue, but something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: watto

customer_reviews.title: Best for cans, not bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Noise is a tad bit too much, but nothing compared to an air conditioning unit. Had no issues with temperature control or lighting. Could carry with just myself by grabbing one hand on the bottom and one on the top. Larger than I thought it would be, yet held less than I expected (don’t buy for beer/glass bottles, this one is much better used for cans as you can only fit 1/MAYBE 2 rows of bottles, which would take up your entire fridge). All in all, great product, probably the best one on the market from what I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: E. Aleman Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: we had a niche where this would fit and very few bev refrigerators actually fit, The first two I ordered from other companies arrived severely damaged, I risked this one and it arrived in perfect shape. As far as cold, we keep it at 34 degrees, can go to 33, so far everything stays cold. there is like a fan on the top shelf that blocks another shelf from going in, that is the only negative for me, but all else seems perfect for what we wanted and looks sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Al Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Drinks NOT COLD
customer_reviews.text: Looks great...fits all of our beverages like we wanted but our drinks are NOT COLD. Would not recommend. Purchased for Christmas gift...not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't Find a Single Fault
customer_reviews.text: Update: Aug 29. 2019 Nine weeks later. I’m still very pleased with this refrigerator! Works perfectly. ———————————————————- This little refrigerator is great. The capacity is as advertised, the construction is great quality, the appearance is quite pleasing. A few folks said the shelves don't fit properly; there's no problem with the way the shelves fit in mine; if inserted properly, they reach from side to side, and are are stable and sturdy. I've used it now for about 3 weeks, and it resides in a hot garage here in North Central Texas ; it performs quite well keeping about 80-100 beverages chilled to 38°. I'm happy that I bought this refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that keeps the drinks at the temperature you select. It has a backlight however when it’s full it can be hard to see the drinks on the bottom shelves. Doesn’t hold as many drinks as I assumed however you can adjust the shelving to accomdate things as you’d like. I’ve read in other reviews that it can be noisy however I would disagree and find it rather quiet when on. And the door can be reversed with a Phillips screwdriver and about 10 minutes of work.
customer_reviews.author: Ant S

customer_reviews.title: Had it for a few weeks, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Granted we have only been using it for about a month, but we are satisfied! It holds lots of drinks and perfect size for wine bottles. It stay cool, and the black/metal frame looks classy. Friends have complimented it and appreciate the glass door to view what is inside. You can also make the door open the opposite direction depending on where you want to place it in the room. We haven't done this yet but plan on doing that soon which is nice because the way the door swings didn't have to impact our decision where to place it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Bennett

customer_reviews.title: This is one hardworking fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a small fridge to keep my insulin and water cold. I purchased this a few months ago and I am absolutely blown away. First of all, it is an absolutely lovely fridge, second it works like a charm keeping my insulin and drinks nice and cold. I would recommend this fridge to everyone! Beautiful, great price and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: LillyF

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little refrigerator. I am using this in my home for fresh fruits and veggies so I can have more room in the main house fridge. Works perfectly and I love being able to easily see the fruit available to munch on as I'm walking through the kitchen looking for a snack. As a bonus, it has also increased the amount of fruit my son is eating on a daily basis since he can see it easier.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is just as good as my previous one and holds just as many sodas while being less bulky at the same time. Adding my comments mainly because there has been complaints about this cooler being loud, but I haven't found that to be the case. It certainly makes noise, but no where as distracting as some has made it out to be. I have mind in the living room and no one's noticed that it's quietly running in the background when we have guests over or watching TV. For $200+ cooler, this is a good value in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Brian48

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality junk
customer_reviews.text: badly finished and doesn't cool well at all. the shelves are so flimsy that they are prone to tipping over. how is this even rated so high?? very odd
customer_reviews.author: AZ Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviews this doesn't come close to the advertised temps
customer_reviews.text: Fridge is very nice build quality. My biggest problem is the fridge won't get lower than 39-40 cold. You can set the thermostat to 33 but you will never see that. I have tested this with multiple thermometers and with the fridge completely empty, partly full, and full. I have never seen temps lower than 39-40.
customer_reviews.author: Derek B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a nice unit unfortunately mine arrived damaged. It had a dent in the front of the door right where you would see it. I was a little disappointed but Amazon quickly made it right and I appreciated that. As other stated in their reviews the top shelf area does not stay as cool as the lower shelves. I thought maybe the temperature would even out after a few days but I've had it for a month and it stays that way. Aside from that I have no complaints. It's a very nice unit for the price it runs quiet and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Rummel

customer_reviews.title: Best seller on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the product itself, and it's exactly what we needed. Fits nicely beside my kitchen counter and freed up a ton of space in my regular refrigerator. But more importantly, I'm absolutely delighted with the seller. They took ownership for a problem regarding delivery that was not their fault in any way. They kept in constant contact with me, sometimes multiple times day with updates as to what was going on. Their attitude from the outset was "we will fix this, period". And they did exactly that. I will look for opportunities to do business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great little 'fridge' !!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little refrigerator at a good price. Very well packaged and arrived without a scratch. I bought it for my 'mancave' home bar and stocked it with 48 bottles and a 12 pack of cans in the bottom area. It keeps the stock at a cool 37 (adjustable) degrees and is whisper-quiet. The digital display is easy to see from a distance and the interior lighting looks really nice when the room lights are low. I've only had if for a month, but I'm very happy with it so far. I'll update if that changes, but so far, I'd recommend with no hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: DToddTop Contributor: Chess

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking fridge. The thermistor table could use some updating.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking fridge. Built quality is above average. Arrived in good shape, no dings or scratches. You can set the thermostat to 33 but it will never get there. I couldn’t get it to go below 40. Since I needed this for dry aging beef, I had to put a 20k ohm resistor in parallel with the thermistor to kick the compressor back on and cool it some more. Got it down to 36, which is good enough for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend- Super Cold & Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fridge last year. It has been amazing because it keeps drinks really cold and looks great. Ours is on our covered back patio and fits quite a bit of beer nicely. We do have to be careful because we have a clear covering on our patio and I think the sun does affect the temperature because of the glass front. But, since we live in a very moderate climate, it hasn’t been much of an issue. I did a lot of research because I like my drinks really cold and I wanted something aesthetically pleasing. This cooler really fits the bill, I’m so glad I chose it because even over a year later it’s still great.
customer_reviews.author: iluvhumboldt

customer_reviews.title: Arrived missing a part: an adjustable foot
customer_reviews.text: The beverage cooler arrived & is missing an important part: one of the adjustable feet. So, it only has an exposed screw in the right front side. Fortunately, I didn't scratch my floor while unboxing it & moving it a little but before noticing how unlevel it was. If it is missing something this obvious, it makes me nervous about quality control for the rest of the product. Also, it doesn't work very well if it isn't level. The seller was very prompt in offering a generous discount on the product & I will work with the manufacturer to get a foot. The beverage fridge works very well, thus far, otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor K. Skaar

customer_reviews.title: Poor Temperature  Uniformity
customer_reviews.text: First Off-Product arrived with two dents, the top corner had to have been damaged before the foam packing and box. Secondly -the temperature display is Only for what you would like it to cool to. Even though the cooling plate at the back registers 08 F with an infrared thermometer, the outside row of cans has never been lower than 58 F. The fan-air circulation is poor. Lastly- We had to tape over the unused handhold to prevent the unit from being pulled off the counter. I would not buy-hOmeLabs Beverage Refrigerator and Cooler-again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Drink fridge
customer_reviews.text: Using this in my wet bar. Nice product so far. Adjustable temperature, and cool interior light. I wish the light had a self dimming or timer but it's just on or off. The interior shelves are adjustable. All useful features. Had it a month and it is running great. Quiet and no problems. Nice looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joshl74

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's an indulgence. I really don't need this thing but it's cool to have in my office so that I don't have to go all the way downstairs to the kitchen and get a drink. One bad thing was it arrived damaged by FedEx. There were some huge dents inside, but luckily the fridge was still intact and working. I contacted Amazon who contacted the seller and they worked with me on a solution. Needless to say, I am very happy with this BEvERage fridge. The glass allows you to look and decide on what you want before opening. This thing is one of those things I wonder how I lived without before. Woo hoo
customer_reviews.author: R. Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice at this Price Point
customer_reviews.text: I was a little scared because of some of the bad reviews and when I plugged it in it didn't seem to get cold but the next morning the beverages are ice cold the door was crystal clear and for the price this is a terrific purchase the only knock is that it is a little bit flimsy but it works great looks great and I would highly recommend it at this price point
customer_reviews.author: Reid Wissner

customer_reviews.title: It does the work
customer_reviews.text: Temp control is not the same temp of a regular thermometer I have a regular thermometer it’s at 40 degrees and the fridge is set at 35 degrees LOL
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL & SORAYA PINTO

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler. We love the size, the clean design, the clear glass, the temperature control, and the inside light. I thought there was a problem with it icing over. I contacted the company, and they immediately moved into action to help me. I then discovered that my kids were not getting the door completely closed! That has been remedied, and no icing occurs. Would recommend this beverage cooler, and may buy another for upstairs, and as a gift fir others.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Daniella Knight

customer_reviews.title: Cold drinky
customer_reviews.text: I kept to the instructions and kept a 1/2 inch gap between my drinks. This way cold air can flow evenly and cool our drinks quicker. I had this fridge full of sodas for a Christmas party and never wondered if they were cold enough. I started out at 45 degrees, which was cool enough, but then I went with 40F and all drinks are now as cold as they can be. Fridge hasn't given off weird sounds or given me a reason to suspect anything. Turned out to be a real nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cade C. HinesTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good size and looks great
customer_reviews.text: The fridge was really perfect for our setup. It was just the right size and not too tall, not too deep, and really looks great with the glass front and the optional back-light. We haven't used it for cans, but it fit 48 12 oz bottles of water, with some additional room to spare. I would expect it would fit the same amount of glass bottles, perhaps more since you could arrange the necks differently to get a better configuration. Overall, the fridge is great, quiet, looks good, and does what it should!
customer_reviews.author: DinKC

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact fridge
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice little fridge. Handy for a dry bar. Quiet and efficient. Lots of room for bottles and/or cans. The only complaint I have is that it was delivered on its side (a big no-no for fridges), despite HUGE warning labels stating not to do this, but that's not the manufacturer's fault. That's totally on Amazon for choosing some two-bit, fly-by-night operation called "FedEx". 😀 Luckily, after sitting upright for 24 hours before being plugged in, it ran perfectly. No damage to the compressor (despite the best efforts of the courier).
customer_reviews.author: Steve DeGroof

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This mini frig does not cool well at all, never reached below 36.5 degrees and this when it's half emptied. The bottom portion has this huge area towards the rear where the compressor is probably mounted behind it, and can't put anything upright without it tipping over and knocking down whats in front. If your putting bottles of water or bottled beers, your capacity is much much less and the max cool will be between 38-40 degrees . not happy with this unit and won't recommend it, unless your using it to CHILL wine
customer_reviews.author: JTMOBIL

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, perfect temperature! I did a lot of research before buying a garage fridge for my husband’s beer (as a Father’s Day gift) and this one did not disappoint. It fit perfectly right under the workbench and is super quiet, you’d forget it was there. We’ve only had to adjust the temperature once to get it right and it keeps everything perfect at 42-degrees (44 wasn’t cold enough for my husband’s liking). I would recommend this product to anyone looking for quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: imasurfgrl

customer_reviews.title: no automatic light with door activity
customer_reviews.text: The light remains either on or off. It does not turn on when you open the door automatically. You have to turn it on manually. Then you have to turn it off manually before closing the door since it will not turn down.
customer_reviews.author: UC

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure it can fit 120 cans like it says without removing the racks but it sure fits a lot. It's perfect for what I desired and the space I wanted to place it. I give it a 5 star for overall love and a 4 star for noise. Make sure if you are placing it in a small room you fill it with warm beverages before you want a little rest. Until it cools everything down to your desired temperature it is a little noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Williams

customer_reviews.title: Solid and works!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold as much as I thought it would, but this thing works great. It has been in my humid Iowa garage all summer and has kept 48 cans of beer, yes I'm Iowa, all summer. Stored Cole Slaw and smoked pork in it for 48 hours - beer in coolers then - with no issues. Definitely a thumbs up for this product! Great beer fridge and short time food cooler. Don't ask me about wine beverages cuz I don't hang with whiners.
customer_reviews.author: timindbq

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: We have had similar sized refrigerators in the past and paid much more, but this unit is by far the quietest and most efficient. I highly recommend this unit for anyone looking to have beer, wine, soda or water chilled in an upstairs room for easy access! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie V

customer_reviews.title: Temperature range
customer_reviews.text: Edit 2/23. Absolutely amazing customer service on this issue. I've had this fridge since the 8th. I have the temp set to 35 degrees but as you can see in the pic I can't get it anywhere close to that. I love the look of the fridge but it just won't get as cold as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy R. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great refrigerator for the price
customer_reviews.text: What sold me on this item was a good price, the ability to take the temp down to 33 degrees F, and the good reviews. I purchased a frig thermometer to make sure the refrigerator was doing what it was supposed to be doing and I confirmed that the temp inside is what it's supposed to be. It's quiet as well and looks sharp. Definitely pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T. Liuzza

customer_reviews.title: Fast chilling and plenty of interior room.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooler as a replacement for a more expensive one that stopped working. So far I am extremely satisfied and although lighter weight than the previous cooler, the drinks are colder and easier to access. The cooler arrived very well packaged and the only problem I had was removing the shelves for correct placement. They were stuck close to the fan box from shifting a little during transit. A bit of shimmying and out they popped. Am I happy? Yes indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Anthea McCallister

customer_reviews.title: Will not go below 41
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement for this cooler says it goes to 33 degrees. I am seeing photos of other people with the blue temp digital readout showing in the 30's. Just got mine yesterday and it will not go below 41 F. Max is 65f. These are not the advertised parameters. I put a thermostat in there and it is only readinh 45 degrees, which is far from cool enough for beer. Very disappointing and will be looking for a replacement or a refund. This is a wine chiller at best
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Emery

customer_reviews.title: Great refrigerator for wine and beer
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this refrigerator for a few weeks and have been very impressed with the capacity and temperature control. It keeps our beers at a perfect, 33 degrees! Also, for folks who are wondering about whether it can fit wine bottles, the answer is yes. A normal 750ml bottle can fit laying on its side with the bottom of the bottle against back wall. You do not need to lie it diagonally.
customer_reviews.author: David W Rose

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works equally well!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for under our bar in our media room and it was the perfect fit and a great price. We've had it for 6 months now with no issues whatsoever. Keeps our beverages the perfect temperature. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not as cold as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product looks good and is working just decent so far. You have to remove one shelf if you're planning on using just bottles to make the bottles fit. You can keep approximately 44 bottles in this refrigerator by removing that shelf. The only reason why I gave this product 4 stars instead of 5 is it keeps the temp at approximately 40 degrees. Still cold enough to keep my beers cold but I would like it a little bit colder, 33 like the thermostat sets at.
customer_reviews.author: glenn Spagnuolo

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! This does NOT hold 120 "standard" sized soda or beer cans!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a BOLD faced lie to say that this holds 120 standard sized beer or soda cans. It hods a maximum of 74 x 12 ounce cans! 46 short of their lying claim! One of the reasons I got this was to have more cold sodas on hand. I would not have bought this if I knew they were lying. Too bulky to send back so I guess I just got screwed.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie B

customer_reviews.title: It has a glass door.
customer_reviews.text: This is a mini fridge with a glass door. Obvious right? Well I say that because it better be important to you that it has a glass door because you pay significantly more for that door. It looks nice in the room at least and it keeps the drinks cold. The light is a cool feature, but unfortunately, if you put anything on the top shelf (ex. beer/soda cans)it blocks the light from illuminating the fridge almost entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy this after reading some of the reviews, but I have nothing but positive things to say about it. Great size overall. Tucks right into the corner. Fits a lot inside. Have no problems with the shelves. Keeps our drinks cold. Never hear it running. If you're looking for a drink fridge, this is a great one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hrydziuszko

customer_reviews.title: Quiet as a church mouse
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! I have it down in the mancave next to the projector, and it is not even noticeable in terms of sound. Regarding looks, this little guy gets a compliment anytime anybody new comes over to watch the game. Very sleek, easy to spot your favorite light beer without opening up the fridge door. I will update the review if anything changes from what I mentioned above! Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, internal dimensions are not quite right
customer_reviews.text: It is a good unit, and good value. Beware though that some reviews state a corny keg will fit inside if you remove the shelves - it will not. However this is a good unit for it's main intention - storing cans and bottles of beverages. The vendor worked with me and is very fair. I would buy again from this vendor, but would recommend when dimensions are critical you call to check first as returns would be challenging. However this vendor was very good to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: David Field

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Installed for almost a week now and no issues whatsoever. The packaging was far better than I expected, and letting it stand 24 hours after unboxing, to acclimate to the temperature inside the room, seems to make a difference in how fast it came to temperature. We turned the cooler on and let it stand one hour as recommended. We filled it with an assortment of different bottle types and no difference temperature between glass or plastic. It’s very quiet, clearly was designed with cans in mind, but will hold bottles as well.
customer_reviews.author: BrianK

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and came with a dent to the door
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my daughter and son-in-law. They spend a lot of time on boats and traveling so they needed something to keep lots of beverages handy at short notice. The refrigerator works well enough, but I really dislike that it came with a dent to the door. It came in packing so the dent was at the factory or or where it was packaged. It was quite pricey compared to similar models at The Big Box store. If I had to do it over again I'd buy them the cheaper one at the Box Store
customer_reviews.author: Nana Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great,  less filling
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic look, keeps everything chilled perfect. No problems whatsoever. Packaged with a ton of styrofoam, no damage in transit. Easy to assemble (none). Exactly what I expected. Minimal noise, although we prefer some ambient noise in the house so our dogs don't bark at every leaf falling off the tree outside!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sloan Dobbels

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold 120 standard cans
customer_reviews.text: These are my observations: Pros: - it looks really nice in my kitchen - it is quiet - it is digital - the blue light is cool Cons: - it does not hold 120 standard cans. Not even close. Since the floor only holds ten cans, and the top rack is hampered by the protruding fan, you only have two rows that hold 25 cans each. The shelf configuration just doesn’t work, and it’s very frustrating. I would have paid more to have the extra capacity, but I really don’t like the false representation. Overall: I’ll keep the unit, but it is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Donette Homra

customer_reviews.title: Great Fridge, Poor Lighting
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in a retail environment for the past 6 months. It is very quiet. Stays at a consistent temperature and holds all the cans great. Sturdy shelves. I’m happy with everything except the lighting. It is so dark. There is a single light on the interior ceiling. Once you put product on the top shelf it blocks the light completely so no light penetrates to display the lower shelves. Makes it a real challenge to see what’s inside, despite the great glass door. It’s so dark I am removing it from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, very cold, and a quiet compressor!
customer_reviews.text: This fridge doesn't just have a great design, it gets cold quickly and stays there. The temperature control is rather accurate and it keeps things very cold. The light isn't very bright inside, but it's nice to have. Changing the door sides is a bit difficult to do by yourself, and they filled the holes on the other side with insulation that you have to drill out first (not fun). Other than that, this thing is rather quiet and I've been able to have it right next to my bed without any concerns of noise keeping me up.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Prone to damage in transit and doesn’t cool.
customer_reviews.text: The cooler was damaged in transit. The front right corner and rear left corner were dented. Aside from this, the cooler would not cool below 50 degrees. Customer service was outstanding. My purchase price was refunded and I’m left with disposing of the unit. I’m reluctant to repurchase the same product for fear of the same outcome. I’m going to purchase locally where returns are easy and repairs are possible. Amazon is great. Customer service at HomeLabs is great, but the product is readily damaged (as noted in other reviews) and it doesn’t cool to manufactures claims.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cold.
customer_reviews.text: HomeLab cooler came on time and heavily packaged. Moved to my downstairs level then unboxed it. (My son helped to move it downstairs. Fairly large when in box.) Set the cooler in place and let it set for the 24hrs. as requested by the manufacturer. Started it up and put about 6 cans of Pepsi in it. Within a few hours the cans were very cold. I set the temp at 35 degrees for I like very cold beverages. The cooler works great and looks great. My old G.E. compact fridge lasted 28 years hopefully this HomeLab cooler can come close.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: No Cooling Problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product with little investigation, and only read the few negative reviews after ordering. I haven't had a problem with cooling, even with the unit very full. Unit also very quite. So pleased that I ordered a second one for upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: DonDublis

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We have remodeled our kitchen and this was a perfect updated addition. We love the look of it with light inside and it does keep beverages cold. I keep my wine in it because I am one of those who is not a wine connoisseur and loves her wine cold! My husband loves it for his beer which is cold enough too. We even put our soft drinks in it. It is very noticeable and makes a statement . If you compare prices , this refrigerator is nicely priced.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Great mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for big party we were having. We wanted our guests to be able to get drinks from something other than a ice cooler. This is great. It holds a TON of drinks and looks fabulous in our kitchen. The only negative I give it is the shelves need to be a little wider so they're more stable. Other than that, it's a great addition to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf4

customer_reviews.title: Great bev fridge!
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t had this long, but love how it arrived ... boxed up fantastic and in great shape! It is a great size, holds a lot of drinks and it’s quiet. We have this in our bedroom, for keeping extra drinks cold when we have out of town guests, so I would love if we could turn off the blue temperature light ... hock can be a little bright at night ... but we are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NekkidFish

customer_reviews.title: Shortfall of the cooler
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks and feels well constructed. However..I replaced the original unit because of a problem that the replacement unit has as well. The cooler cannot seem to get beverages cooler than about 42 degrees. I like my sodas at about 34 to 38 and no matter if you have one can or fill it full...the coolers internal temperature is at least 10 warmer than the digital setting. If 42 is OK with you...I recommend. If you want COLD....keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great option for a beer fridge!
customer_reviews.text: got this for my home studio “beer fridge.” capacity is less than advertised (width needs another inch or two to accommodate another column of four-deep cans), but who needs to store more than 75 cans at a time? i haven’t checked the internal temp with a gauge, but i set mine at 39 degrees and the beers are frosty. fridge is quiet enough for me to do voiceover recordings with it running in the background. the light is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: litmusrex

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small main refrigerator and found that it was filled largely with beverages. That inspired me to find a cost-effective beverage refrigerator, which I found in this unit. It is silent, even at the coolest setting. It is reasonably attractive; I keep it in my dining room where I can readily grab a can or soda or whatnot. It is slightly too short for longer wine bottles, such as for a Reisling, but otherwise everything fits well. Shelves are adjustable to suit your favorite beverages, and it cools everything just perfectly. Also, my first unit arrived damage (large dent on the side); I was sent a replacement immediately. Excellent communication in that regard and overall.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Cat

customer_reviews.title: the shelves don't fit
customer_reviews.text: If you fill up the shelves, prepare for them to collapse. Really annoying, how hard is it to build the right size shelf?
customer_reviews.author: John Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet. I use for bottled water at my store. First time I put 4 bottles in a row, but the back row was right against the back fridge wall and the water froze, so now I just shorten the rows to 3 bottles. The silver edge does show finger smudges, but that's to be expected. Had it for 6 months now -- I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: imsimply

customer_reviews.title: Great mini fridge and product support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mini fridge in December 2018 and it works great, as advertised. After about 6 months, there was a front glass seal failure that caused moisture to form between the two insulated glass panels. This problem was only cosmetic because fridge worked fine. I contacted customer support about this moisture problem and they honored their one year warranty and quickly sent me a new mini fridge replacement. Such a great experience I had with them!
customer_reviews.author: Lunar Module

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of beverage coolers and the reviews are usually not so great. This one had good reviews or at least better than others that I've read. So far, after 4 months of use I'm very happy. It's quiet, keeps the drinks very cold, and looks great in my bar. What else could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: B. Mickey

customer_reviews.title: High end fridge at a premium price. Worth it though.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little fridge and gets really cold! I was also concerned when I read the other reviews, but I have not experienced and issues. Yes it is a little noisy, but not as noisy and a small dorm room fridge and gets much colder. Shipping: The manufacturer double boxed this, using hard cardboard and plastic protectors to ensure it arrived in great condition. There were no issues with it at all. It is a lot more expensive than other beverage refrigerators in Amazon, but I think it was worth it. Defiantly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: John Emyril

customer_reviews.title: Filled with flammable gas!  Fire risk!
customer_reviews.text: This uses the new cyclopentane refrigerant, which is flammable! It comes with warning labels all over it. Had I know this, I never would have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey paul

customer_reviews.title: Overall very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and style and it seems to be doing a good job of keeping a fairly stocked fridge overall cool. I saw some complain about that, so far it works perfectly fine for me. The only downside, and reason for not giving 5 stars, is it came with a small dent in the top edge. The packaging was excellent and box not damaged at all so it's clear it was put in the box damaged. If it wasn't that it's not overly noticeable and not worth the hassle of returning i would have done so.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Owned this for several months now and have not had any issue with keeping temperature throughout the fridge. Beers on top and the bottom are ice cold. We keep it in our media room and does not disturb watching TV/movies when the compressor kicks on.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Love this fridge, sleek and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Great small refrigerator. Being able to hold 120 cans is a bit of a stretch... maybe if you are only storing red bull (which come in those thin cans). But regardless, the fridge is perfect, looks classy and is pretty quiet. It is not silent because it has a fan to circulate the air, but for having a fan, it is pretty quiet. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Fridge
customer_reviews.text: It's kinda small and if you plan on storing any upright (open) bottles of white wine, it consumes way too much space. I can't store nearly as much as I could in previous fridges (Fidgaire and a SubZ). Next issue is, sadly, temperature control. Not only does the fridge never reach the set temperature (closest has been 4 degrees off) but there also is a huge temperature differential between the top shelf and the bottom of the fridge (5+ degree difference!!). Overall this fridge is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use on my covered deck. Arrived with some damage, company was very easy to work with and a reasonable and quick resolution was agreed to. Unit runs quietly, interior light is nice and gives it a great look at night. Would be 5 stars on temp control but it is colder nearer the cooling unit that on other shelves, but it holds it's temperature within a good range throughout the day. Will move indoors this winter, but a great way to keep some extra beverages conveniently on hand and free up space in the main fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Updated: Customer service helped me reset the fridge and it has been working since. Set at 34 degrees, I have cold beer at last. Unit will not stay cold, I have had it for exactly one week. I've fluctuated the temperature settings, and tried every solution offered by the owner's manual to no avail. It is a non returnable item so I have reached out to the seller and I'm waiting for a response.
customer_reviews.author: Surf

customer_reviews.title: Hassle when the door does not have a good suction to close securely every time you close it.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice but make sure you always check the door when you close it. It tends to not shut securely and then you have to unplug for a few hours and then plug it back in! I wish the door shut when you pushed it closed but it does unless you push a little hard to make sure it suctions shut!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar Fridge
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He loves this fridge. It is compact yet spacious. He loves the glass door and is very happy about how cool it keeps his drinks. We have had it installed for over a month and have had no issues. I will say that it is quite large in the box and I needed his help to bring it inside. It also had "beverage cooler" and the brand printed right on the box so keeping this a secret was nearly impossible.
customer_reviews.author: eno8cc

customer_reviews.title: So far so good... now if it would light up when you opened the door it would be Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Only have used it about a month. So far so good. Seems quiet to me (small hum when it runs). Keeps everything nicely cold. Bigger unit than I was expecting. My only disappointment is that the light is not automatic. You have to hit the light button inside the fridge. I wish it was automatic and would turn on when you opened the door like a regular fridge. Maybe they will make this change in future models?
customer_reviews.author: MsMomof2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for guest bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my guests to enjoy a cold beverage or snack in the bedroom in which they stay. I wanted to give a hotel feel to it, but this nice fridge is even classier. I read some critical reviews about capacity, but I’m not trying to provide 96 cans of cold beer in a mini fridge! Perfect little refrigerator for the purpose I stayed!
customer_reviews.author: Sessums71

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This fridge keeps my home brewed beer at 33 degrees. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Copper

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic, works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few days ago. It takes a day of upright rest before plugging it in, an hour of maximum temperature control before putting anything in, and about 5-6 for beverages to get cold in it. It's aesthetically pleasing too. I've got Coke, Orange Vanilla Coke, Cherry Coke, Vanilla Coke, Mexican Coke, and Pepsi in mine. It looks almost like a vending machine and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Bang fridge
customer_reviews.text: Seriously such an amazing high quality mini fridge! I use it for my works bang energy drinks and all my sales guys love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Cooling ability is very average
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of the refrigerator but I returned my first one after a week because it was not keeping beverages cold. They sent me a replacement refrigerator which is a little better but still not great. The lowest temperature setting is 33° but when there are cans in the refrigerator it’s lucky if it cools to 40°.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hackman

product_meta.title: hOmeLabs Beverage Refrigerator and Cooler - 120 Can Mini Fridge with Glass Door for Soda Beer or Wine - Small Drink Dispenser Machine for Office or Bar with Adjustable Removable Shelves
feature_bullets: MODERN ELECTRIC BEVERAGE COOLER - This 3.2 cubic feet, free standing beverage refrigerator features an elegant see through, left hinge glass front door with a stainless steel frame for you to view your wine, beer or soda at a glance. Its white LED interior light illuminates for easy, nighttime selection of your favorite chilled drink

LARGE CAPACITY BEER & WINE CHILLER - Under counter beverage cooler with large, internal storage design is equipped with 3 adjustable and removable chrome shelves. Drinks organizer conveniently holds up to 120 standard sized soda or beer cans, or several bottles of wine

ADVANCED TEMPERATURE CONTROLS - Single zone beverage mini refrigerator has an easy touch temperature control that cools down to 34°F, and large digital display for quick monitoring and setting of any temperature. Its memory function automatically restores the preset temperature of the cooler in case it becomes unplugged, or in the event of a power outage

POWERFUL COOLING SYSTEM - Our 120V 240W heavy duty, vertical chiller features energy efficient advanced technology, and a whisper quiet compressor that works with a small convection fan to cool quickly, and keep consistent air circulation for a uniform temperature supply inside. Perfect for an office, dorm, apartment, RV, restaurant, home kitchen and more

AUTO DEFROSTING FUNCTION - Beverage cooler is also designed with an additional temperature sensor for auto defrost mode. External size: 18.9” W (front across) x 33.3” H (top to bottom) x 17.30” D (front to back). Internal size: 16” W x 29” H x 12” D. NOTE: Images show EXTERNAL Dimensions rounded UP to nearest decimal. Warning: Do not use this cooler to store fresh foods, such as meats, vegetables, fruits, etc. This product can only be used to chill beverages.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,195 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
